channel.title: 2 Simple Questions!
channel.description:
1. If i look at my emeotions, they are teleports. Like when u press shops u will go to shops, when u press home u go to home. Now, my question is, how can i change them? I already searched for them name in client.java, but i can't find it to change it. With name i mean like shops. Then in wich file can i change it?
2. How can i change prices?

item.title: 2 Simple Questions!
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

If your source does not have a seperate handler for action buttons, search case 185: or packet 185.

Packet 185 handles action buttons.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

The text on the emotes can be found in textHandler.java. The actions they do are in client.java. If the emote teleports you, search for the coordinates in the client class, or search something like customCommand(“home”); or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Does your server have a Clickingmost.java or Actionbuttons.java?
If so, check there.

Read full topic
